name: Brinemegeddon
description:
YET ANOTHER culmination of a YEAR of hard work behind the scenes has ALMOST been COMPLETED! I just want to thank ALL of you who have supported my previous game GATETAIL in ANY way shape or form, each and every one of you have been a massive support and I thank you all for that!

NOTE: If you want to play the DEMO, here's the link to the gamejolt!
https://gamejolt.com/games/brinemegeddon/861107



Uh oh, it's Brinemegeddon!


Brinemegeddon is a colorful action-adventure strategy RPG with a comedic story-rich basis and immersive combat/puzzle based world sprinkled nicely with narrative, fast-paced combat, and fun minigames! Join Ashley and her friends, (People with ACTUAL names!?) as she procrastinates to the point where an ACTUAL demon takes over her mind and CHAOS AND CHARACTER ARCS ENSUE!!!

In the world of Brinemegeddon, however, powerful interdimensional threats like demons traveling through the mind to other worlds are NOT taken lightly by those just outside reality's borders! Who KNOWS who (or what) might show up to "regulate" these dimensional delinquents!

Do YOU have what it takes to make it through Brinemegeddon's combat, challenges, puzzles, and more in order to SAVE the rapidly shifting lands you ONCE called home!?

Well, there's only one way to find out, now is there?


Features:

- 10+ unique challenging bosses (+Well ending)

- Action-packed team-based combat (Just don't use blizzard.)

- Vastly unique and varied locations (Have you ever been sent cross -country from an exploding bubble before?)

- Fun and interesting enemies (Randy's here too.)

- Tons of different minigames & mechanics (FISHINGGGG RETURNSSS!!!!!!!!!!!!)

- Diverse & interesting characters (& The Swazzler.)

- Varied and challenging minigames + puzzles (Without relying on RNG!)

- Horror elements (No jumpscares.)

- Comedy (Ah yes.)

- Gambling (AGAIN) (WE CANT HAVE THIS IN OUR 13+ (simulated gambling) GAME.)





As you can see, Brinemegeddon's a CHAOTIC and EVER-CHANGING world ready for YOU! (and you specifically.)



And, as always,
Ribbit, ribbit.
